title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Adaptive Scientific Leadership Based on Multimodal Learning Analytics (MMLA)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data literacy and experience with mobile learning environments
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners explain MMLA’s core concepts (integrated analysis of behavioral, cognitive, and interaction data) and apply them to science education design
Learners visualize learner engagement patterns using LMS-built analytics tools and establish personalized feedback strategies
Learners design scalable MMLA models in corporate training environments by applying data-pedagogy integration frameworks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
